title: Dominate Beast
content:
Dominate Beast Level 4 Enchantment Spell Make a beast fight alongside you. Every time the beast takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination 10 turns 18mWIS Save Concentration Action Level 4 Spell Slot

Level 4 Enchantment Spell

Make a beast fight alongside you. Every time the beast takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination

18mWIS Save Concentration

Dominate Beast is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Dominate Beast is a Lvl 4 Spell from the Enchant
